Interface IBigValue

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BigValue, MyBigDecimal

    public interface IBigValue

    • Method Detail

      • getZero

        IBigValue getZero()
        Returns an instance of the class representing the value zero.

      • isZero

        boolean isZero()
        Returns true if this instance has a value of zero.

      • value

        double value()
        Returns the value held by the instance (in true form, not as log, and with sign applied).

      • isPositive

        boolean isPositive()
        Returns true if this instance has a value greater than zero.

      • lnValue

        double lnValue()
        Returns logarithm of the value represented by the instance. Returns NaN if the value is negative.

      • E

        void E(double value)
        Equals (=) operation. Assigns the given value to this instance, replacing current value.

      • E

        void E(IBigValue v)
        Equals (=) operation. Assigns given value (specified via another instance of LogValue) to this instance, replacing current value.

      • PE

        void PE(IBigValue x)
        Plus-equals (+=) operation. Replaces the current value with the one obtained by adding the given value, considering signs of both.

      • PEa1Tv1

        void PEa1Tv1(double a1,
             IBigValue v1)
        Plus-equals (+=) a1 times v1.

      • TE

        void TE(IBigValue x)
        Times-equals (*=) operation. Replaces the current value with the one obtained by multiplying the given value, considering signs of both.

      • DE

        void DE(IBigValue x)
        Divide-equals (/=) operation. Replaces the current value with the one obtained by dividing the given value, considering signs of both.

      • TE

        void TE(double a1)
        Times-equals (*=). Replaces current value by multiplying it by the given value.
        Parameters:
        a1 -
